Room.Name: Outside the howling hole
Room.Description: A strong chilling wind blows over you as it rushes down into a gaping hole in the ground. The dark ruins above you prevents any real view of what lies down below. All you know is that some terrible howling is coming from within. Above you soft grey light filters in from the ruins.

Exit.Description: Only pitch-black night can be seen.

Room.Name: Inside the howling hole
Room.Description: This hole is dark and confined and the chilling winds from above blow down the hole with stunning force. A small pile of torn, crushed bones has been thrown in here like garbage. A hole leads up out of the hole and some dried encrusted bones have been piled up to the west, partly blocking out a tunnel.

Exit.Description: Some bones have been piled up, partly blocking the view of a tunnel.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart. A pile of bones has been stacked to the east, partly blocking out some dark room beyond.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart. Someone has piled up bones to the east, blocking out a room of some sort.

Exit.Description: a pile of bones partly block the view of a dark room.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a dark hallway
Room.Description: This hallway appears to have been part of some old, long gone building. The darkness is almost total and cruel howling echoes all around you. In the distance you can hear the sounds of flesh being rendered apart.

Room.Name: In a collapsed room
Room.Description: This room has been crushed in by the surrounding mountains and is much the worse for wear. Through a hole below you there comes the sounds of demonic screaming and insidious snarling.

Exit.Description: a pile of bones partly block the view of a dark room.

Room.Name: The entrance to the enclaves
Room.Description: The darkness here is absolute, and there is a stench of decay in the air. All around you the walls close in and the darkness clings to your soul. There is a way up here or you can head west into the enclave.

Room.Name: Within the darkened enclaves
Room.Description: The darkness clings to your very soul and the walls seem to be moving in on you. Somewhere a creature lets out a howl of anguish, and sounds of tearing flesh accompany it.

Room.Name: Within the darkened enclaves
Room.Description: The darkness clings to your very soul and the walls seem to be moving in on you. Somewhere a creature lets out a howl of anguish, and sounds of tearing flesh accompany it.

Room.Name: Within the darkened enclaves
Room.Description: The darkness clings to your very soul and the walls seem to be moving in on you. Somewhere a creature lets out a howl of anguish, and sounds of tearing flesh accompany it. A small side corridor leads east.

Room.Name: Within the darkened enclaves

Room.Description: The darkness clings to your very soul and the walls seem to be moving in on you. Somewhere a creature lets out a howl of anguish, and sounds of tearing flesh accompany it.

Room.Name: Within the darkened enclaves
Room.Description: The darkness clings to your very soul and the walls seem to be moving in on you. Somewhere a creature lets out a howl of anguish, and sounds of tearing flesh accompany it. Some thick spider webs have been strung across the corridor to the east while to the south faint trails of webbing hang from the roof.

Exit.Description: Something seems to have blocked the way with thick webs.
Some thick sticky webs hang cascade down the corridor.

Room.Name: It's too dark to see!
Room.Description: You can't see a thing, the darkness is almost total.

Exit.Description: Something seems to have blocked the way with thick webs.

Room.Name: It's too dark to see!
Room.Description: You can't see a thing, the darkness is almost total.

Room.Name: A webbed corridor in the enclaves
Room.Description: Thick sticky spider webs hang from the roof and floor, trying to catch you like some insect. The darkness makes it hard to see them and you are soon totally wrapped in the silky fine strands. Small spiders the size of your hand crawl over and around you but seem uninterested. All around you loud clicking sounds can be heard....

Room.Name: A webbed corridor in the enclaves
Room.Description: Thick sticky spider webs hang from the roof and floor, trying to catch you like some insect. The darkness makes it hard to see them and you are soon totally wrapped in the silky fine strands. Small spiders the size of your hand crawl over and around you but seem uninterested. All around you loud clicking sounds can be heard....

Room.Name: A webbed corridor in the enclaves
Room.Description: Thick sticky spider webs hang from the roof and floor, trying to catch you like some insect. The darkness makes it hard to see them and you are soon totally wrapped in the silky fine strands. Small spiders the size of your hand crawl over and around you but seem uninterested. All around you loud clicking sounds can be heard. A section of the floor has been caved in to make a large jagged hole.

Exit.Description: The darkness is total in that direction.

Room.Name: A webbed corridor in the enclaves
Room.Description: Thick sticky spider webs hang from the roof and floor, trying to catch you like some insect. The darkness makes it hard to see them and you are soon totally wrapped in the silky fine strands. Small spiders the size of your hand crawl over and around you but seem uninterested. All around you loud clicking sounds can be heard....

Room.Description: Thick sticky spider webs hang from the roof and floor, trying to catch you like some insect. All around you loud clicking sounds can be heard....

Room.Name: A webbed corridor in the enclaves
Room.Description: Thick sticky spider webs hang from the roof and floor, trying to catch you like some insect. The darkness makes it hard to see them and you are soon totally wrapped in the silky fine strands. Small spiders the size of your hand crawl over and around you but seem uninterested. All around you loud clicking sounds can be heard....

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...To the north is a mass of thick webs that seem as tough as iron.

Exit.Description: Massive thick strands of spider web.

Room.Name: On a huge web
Room.Description: The corridor has opened out onto a huge web spanning a vast bottomless pit. Webs extend in all directions and leave almost nothing untouched. Large spiders of all sizes crawl across it in response to your prescence. Somewhere in the distance a huge round shape uncurls and rises up on huge hairy legs.

Exit.Description: Large thick webs block the way.

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...a huge black door is in the eastern wall.

Room.Name: In a throne room
Room.Description: A huge throne of ebonite set into the eastern wall dominates this room. Scattered around it are dozens of corpses, ranging from small to gigantic, but all ripped and shredded. The aura of evil that resides here is so total that you feel your very soul shrivel up. A door leads west.

Room.Name: In the altar room
Room.Description: Darkness and silence. This room seems almost tranquil, as if somehow seperated in space from the rest of the area.

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: In the Lower enclaves
Room.Description: A soft chill breeze rustles through the corridor. Your light flickers and dies, only to flare back up again in the darkness. Around you the cries of demonkind intensify. From the back of your mind you sense something evil comes this way...

Room.Name: A Rough-Hewn Tunnel
Room.Description: This poorly made passageway beneath the den stinks of rotted meat and feces. It seems to lead deeper into the earth, beneath the great mountains of the region.

Room.Name: A Rough-Hewn Tunnel
Room.Description: This poorly made passageway beneath the den stinks of rotted meat and feces. It seems to lead deeper into the earth, beneath the great mountains of the region.

Room.Description: This poorly made passageway beneath the den stinks of rotted meat and feces. It seems to lead deeper into the earth, beneath the great mountains of the region.

Room.Description: This poorly made passageway beneath the den stinks of rotted meat and feces. It seems to lead deeper into the earth, beneath the great mountains of the region.

Room.Name: Beneath the Larder
Room.Description: This poorly made passageway beneath the den stinks of rotted meat and feces. It seems to lead deeper into the earth, beneath the great mountains of the region.

NPC.name: drow patroller
NPC.description: This dark elf guards his people's newest enclaves with deadly efficiency. He will not allow any inferiors to interefe in the move of the drow in freeing and allyng themselves withthe Lord of the ruins.
NPC.longDescription: A dark skinned elf screams at your intrusion of the enclaves!

NPC.name: drider
NPC.description: This drider has the disgusting bloated form of a huge spider, but the torso of an elf. The drow who sacrificed his form to the Spider Queen has been rewarded by the bringing of his body into a more appropriate arcahnid one.
NPC.longDescription: A bloated spider with a humanoid torso deteches latches onto you!

NPC.name: spider daemon
NPC.description: This viscous creature has a heavily armored carapice and razor-sharp claws. It resembles a spider except it's legs end in those wicked claws and it's manibles are almost as long as swords and just as sharp.
NPC.longDescription: A chitinous creature hurtles down the corridor in a killing frenzy!
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Warrior Outdoors AssistRace

NPC.name: beast demon
NPC.description: This greater demon is trying to force it's way into the material planes. The nexus it has created for itself is unstable and it is only barely able to maintain it's prescence. Now might be a good time to get rid of it before the drow that called it forth unleashes it's wrath upon you.
NPC.longDescription: A beast is trying to bring itself into existence on the material plane.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: drow priestess
NPC.description: The high priestess assigned to this enclaves is NOT please to see outsiders visiting her. She is far too busy trying to find a way to slay the rakshasa and beholders to bother with the likes of you.
NPC.longDescription: A dark skinned elven woman spits and froths at the mouth in rage!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: medusa
NPC.description: The rock statues around this hag tell you something is very wrong. She glares with bright green-yellow eyes and raises her writhing mass of snakes to bite at you.
NPC.longDescription: A hideous hag with hair of living snakes tries to catch your gaze.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Cleric Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: drow warrior
NPC.description: This dark elf walks with the stance of one who knows he is in his rightful place. This enclave is to be one of the most powerful in Orthos, and he knows he will reap the rewards.
NPC.longDescription: A drow warrior walks the passages in search of any outsiders.

NPC.name: spider
NPC.description: This huge spider stands as tall as your head. It's long hairy legs carry it's bulbous, bloated stomach. As it approaches you hear a definite clicking sound coming from it...you realise that the clicking is from it's rock hard incisors.
NPC.longDescription: A horse sized spider makes clicking sounds as it scuttles towards you.

NPC.name: demon spider
NPC.description: One of the more deadly types of dark-elven worship is the becoming of spider in their most devout ritual. This drow has long since sacrificed his human form to take on that which he most admires, the spider.
NPC.longDescription: A gigantic spider with a man's face is here spinning a web.

NPC.name: drow anti anti-paladin
NPC.description: The drow 1st house have sent some it's finest here to establish the new enclaves in the ruins. This anti-paladin represents the latest ideals of the dark-elves, hate, power and darkness all combined.
NPC.longDescription: A regal dark elf regards you with a sneer of contempt.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: vampire dark-elf drow nosferatu prince
NPC.description: This drow has been to the depths of Hell and returned renwed. His visit to the Spider Queen has resulted in his raising to a new level of existence, and here on the mortal plane he is one of the most powerful drow of the 1st House. Now he commands the latest drow exapnsion, here in the ruins where the new enclaves are to be constructed once the rakshasa are defeated and the beholders compromised with.
NPC.longDescription: An ebon skinned elf turns flaming red eyes upon your soul!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: black drow predator
NPC.description: It's a dark-elf but horribly twisted and deformed. Something from the Abyss that has been sent to fight alongside the mortal drow lords. It's starved for life.
NPC.longDescription: Something black explodes out of the shadows!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Sneak Hide Haste

Item.Name: libram demonomican
Item.ShortDescription: the Demonomican, Libram of the lower planes
Item.LongDescription: a libram of unspeakable evil festers on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood NoRemove RotDeath

Item.Name: spider cloak
Item.LongDescription: a piece of spider-silk has been spun into a cloak and dropped here.

Item.Name: pair spider leggings legs
Item.LongDescription: a pair of severed spider legs have been left twitching on the floor.

Item.Name: plate drow
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of the drow battlearmor
Item.LongDescription: A dark suit of hardened plate armor lies here.

Item.Name: gloves dark-elf skin
Item.LongDescription: A piece of ebony skin formed into a glove lies here.

Item.Name: helm dark-elf dark-elven battle
Item.LongDescription: An equisite helm lies on the ground.

Item.Name: sleeves drow battle
Item.LongDescription: some dark sleeves have been left here.

Item.Name: boot dark-elf dark-elven
Item.LongDescription: A pair of dark obsidian boots have been left here.
